casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Beach SMITH. No. 346A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 21, 2005. Bruce T. Cunningham, Southern Pines, Joseph Blount Cheshire, V, Raleigh, for William Beach Smith. *238C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of July 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 8th day of August 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of July 2005."
